item.title: Feds fail to get indictment against DC sandwich thrower fired by DOJ: Report
item.description: Sean Charles Dunn was fired from his job at the Department of Justice after the sub-chucking incident, which was caught on video.

item.title: Trump White House pressures Fed governor Lisa Cook to go on leave as lawsuit looms
item.description: Kevin Hassett, President Donald Trump's top economic advisor, comments come amid a brewing legal battle between Cook and the Trump administration.

item.title: Fed responds to Trump effort to fire Lisa Cook, notes president needs 'cause'
item.description: Federal Reserve Board Governor Lisa Cook hired Abbe Lowell to fight her termination by President Trump for a case that could land at the Supreme Court...

item.title: 'Our country is in danger': French PM takes confidence vote gamble over budget woes
item.description: France's CAC 40 index plunged 2% on Tuesday as analysts assessed the potential for a fresh period of political instability.

item.title: Cracker Barrel scraps new logo after outrage from customers, Trump
item.description: President Donald Trump's criticism came a day after Cracker Barrel told customers the company could have better handled its controversial logo rebrand...
